Name: Tomb Raider II
About the game: The second instalment in the Tomb Raider series invites you to join Lara as she travels around the globe to retrieve a precious artefact before it falls into the wrong hands. The legendary artefact, the Dagger of Xian, is said to give its possessor the power of a fire breathing dragon.
Meta Title: Tomb Raider II: Nov 28, 2012, Core Design and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Tomb Raider II? Check out the release date (Nov 28, 2012), developer insights from Core Design, and a complete game summary.
